## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] No mock/fake data
- [ ] No `console.log` in production code
- [ ] Build passes
- [ ] Reviewed own diff
- [ ] Screenshots attached (if UI change)

## Gate
- [ ] G0: Requirements clear
- [ ] G2: Tests adequate
